item.title: Authentication via LDAP
item.description: LDAP Authentication Out of the box Defect Dojo does not support LDAP authentication. However, since Defect Dojo is built using Django, it isn’t too difficult to add support for LDAP.

item.title: Performance Enhancements
item.description: Filter String Matching Optimization IN the UI, many of the filters for a given object will also query related objects for an easy visual match of an item to filter on.

item.title: Languages and lines of code
item.description: Import of languages for a project You can import JSON reports generated by the cloc tool via the API: When importing a file, all language information for the respective project will be deleted first and then populated with the content of the file.

item.title: Rate Limiting
item.description: DefectDojo has protection against brute force attacks through rate limiting Configuration For further information, please visit the package documentation Django Ratelimit

item.title: Exporting
item.description: Export Findings Pages that show a list of findings or a list of engagements have a CSV and Excel Export functionality in the top right dropdown menu.
